name: Trade & Distribution Building
par1: Parcel of Complex for Trade and Distribution building with a total area of 2.40 ha is located within the industrial area southwest of the city of Pristina and the terrain of the site is relatively flat and has a~ 2.5% slope in the north-south direction.
par2: The complex for Trade and Distribution-warehouse facilities is composed of four units: Warehouse P + 0, Unit A; Warehouse P + 2, Unit B; Office space P + 2, Unit C and Technical services P + 0 and water reservoir, Unit D separated building. In the complex, workers and staff enter the eastern side, which is also the main entrance, while the other entrances are on the four sides of the complex for loading / unloading of goods as well as emergency entry or exit. Depending on the type of vehicle, the number and position of the parking lots are foreseen as well, all roads and parking areas are made of asphalt. In functional terms, the facility is divided into three parts: storage spaces, office and administration spaces and service spaces.
